mapper.select: SELECT bnumber, btitle, bcontent, bdate, unum, bimage FROM BOARD ORDER BY 1 DESC
mapper.insert: insert into board (btitle, bcontent, unum, bimage, bdate) values(#{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{unum}, #{bimage}, now())
mapper.select: select rnumber, bnumber, r.unum, memberId, rcontent from reply r join user u on r.unum = u.unum and bnumber = #{bnumber} order by 1 desc
mapper.insert: insert into reply (bnumber, unum, rcontent) values(#{bnumber}, #{unum}, #{rcontent})
